title: Classified Data Spill Response
description: An analyst discovers that a classified document was accidentally sent over an unclassified email system.

tasks.description: Identify the specific email containing the classified document and all recipients.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst quickly and accurately identifies the scope of the data spill.

tasks.description: Remotely delete the email from the sender's and all recipients' inboxes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully removes the email from the unclassified system.

tasks.description: Generate a data spill incident report and notify the appropriate security and command authorities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst follows correct procedure for reporting a security incident.
